Title: Trump and Zelenskyy to discuss end of war. And, more troops head to D.C.
Description:
President Trump will host Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy today at the White House.
And, more National Guard troops head to Washington, D.C.
for the president's crime crackdown.

Title: Chinese literature is tough to find in English. One editor hopes to change that
Description:
The novel Women Seated is a thriller about a nanny for a rich family and a kidnapping gone awry.
It's the first in a new effort to redefine the types of Chinese literature get translated into English.

Title: Trump's D.C. 'crisis' enters 2nd week with more soldiers — and no exit strategy
Description:
Leaders in Washington, D.C., say they're striving to maintain calm as growing numbers of National Guard soldiers deploy to the city.
President Trump hasn't said how he wants this "crisis" to end.

Title: AT&T salaries revealed: How much the telecom giant pays designers, software engineers, and other tech workers
Description:
See how much AT&T pays in 2025, with some software engineers earning $207,000 a year.
Salary data shows pay ranges across tech and engineering teams.

Title: I drove Tesla's first car, the 2008 Roadster. It was one of the most fun EVs I've driven in years — and I got a bicep workout.
Description:
Andrew Lambrecht was offered a chance to drive a 2008 Tesla Roadster, estimated to be worth around $150,000.
He said it came with a bicep workout.

Title: Cracking Abandonware DRM Like It’s 1999
Description:

Title: Oh no! Hypocritical celebrities abandon US, blaming Trump. What will we do now? | Opinion
Description:
Talk show host Jimmy Kimmel hints he got Italian citizenship in part because of President Donald Trump.
Give me a break.

has lost its capacity for physical improvement.

Title: Solak: Everything I learned at 10 different NFL training camp stops
Description: After visits with 10 NFL teams in eight states, Ben Solak compiled the best things he heard -- and saw -- throughout the trip.

Title: Apple wins blood oxygen battle for watch owners
Description: Apple just rolled out a redesigned Blood Oxygen feature to specific models, following a recent victory in a legal dispute.

Title: The Met vs. the Met—Softball Edition
Description:
The Metropolitan Opera’s team was undefeated.
So was the Metropolitan Museum’s.
On a Central Park ball field, sound guys and lighting technicians faced off against art handlers and registrars, Dan Greene writes.

Title: The Family Fallout of DNA Surprises
Description:
Millions of Americans are estimated to have learned that they have a different parent through DNA testing, spurring the rise of specialized therapy, podcasts, and N.P.E.
advocacy groups.
Jennifer Wilson reports.

Title: Scientists just found a hidden factor behind Earth’s methane surge
Description:

Tracking down which methanogens in which environment produce methane with a specific isotope signature is difficult, however.
